//	10) Write a program to reverse a
// string
	public static void main(String[] args) {
	 StringBuilder s1 = new StringBuilder("Ahsan");
	 System.out.println(s1);
	 s1.reverse();
	 System.out.println("StringBuilder:" + s1);
}
}
